channel.title: Error occurred during initialization of VM? Can't run server... PI
channel.description:
Error occurred during initialization of VM Could not reserve enough space for object heap Could not create the Java virtual machine. Press any key to continue . . .
^^ I get that when I run my server. It's never happened to me before? :(
Mind telling me how to fix it pl0x? :o :P
